name: Candycornz
description:
Candycornz run jump fly and collect coins as a tiny unicorn before the time runs out and don't fall.

This collectathon platformer is the first game I've ever made it doesn't have everything I  imagined but it has surprised me. I've decided it needed be launched a day before my birthday OCT 16th so for better or worse the deadline has been met and i have achieved something .

However,  weather  not Candycorns  improves depends on the support it gets  please play the game as much as you like and express your interest  by commenting and sharing. your enthusiasm this will keep the game alive and i will be sure to update Candycornz with new features . Feel free to share resources,  ideas or cup of coffee  it helps alot and enables me to invest more time into developing games. if you've read this Thank You

Known (Annoying) Bugs and mandatory fixes in future update:

If  you encounter a mouse error at the title screen please press the windows button on your keyboard  to regain curser  giving you access to the menu buttons. Or  cycle with the [TAB] key for navigation.

game asks for your name twice (very annoying )

More  Color Choices

Android version and New Game Mode

I will work on fixing these issues idk how yet but I  usually do 

Once again Thank You
